levels.description:
Immediately marks a target within range, Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>lengthens significantly</>, and attacks become a hail of arrows aimed at the marked target; the hail of arrows will randomly strike enemies around the marked target, dealing <@ba.vup>{attack@s3_max_hit_num}</> hits of <@ba.vup>{attack@s3_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage and stunning targets hit for <@ba.vup>{attack@s3_stun}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants {attack@s3_trigger_time} ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>
